results.name: Number of twice-factorizations of n of type (R,P,R).
comment: a(n) is the number of ways to choose an integer partition of a divisor of A052409(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
formula: a(1) = 1; for n > 1, a(n) = Sum_{d|A052409(n)} A000041(d). - _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 29 2018
program: A052409(n) = { my(k=ispower(n)); if(k, k, n>1); }; \\ From A052409
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 30 2017
